articles.title: Trevor Story decides to stay with Red Sox, won’t opt out of contract
articles.description:
"It’s a special thing to find, getting back to feeling like myself, like I’m going to do something special each night."

The post Trevor Story decides to stay with Red Sox, won’t opt out of contract appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Trevor Story will remain with the Boston Red Sox, opting not to leave his contract.
Story expressed confidence in his performance, stating he feels like himself again.
His decision impacts the Red Sox's roster stability for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Marat Khusnutdinov keeps cashing in on his opportunities with Bruins
articles.description:
"It's not easy, but he's been hanging really well, and that's why he got my trust.”

The post Marat Khusnutdinov keeps cashing in on his opportunities with Bruins appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marat Khusnutdinov earns trust from Bruins coach Marco Sturm for consistent performance.
Khusnutdinov's contributions are vital as Bruins aim for playoff contention this season.
Local fans celebrate Khusnutdinov's success, boosting morale and support for the team.

articles.title: Marat Khusnutdinov scores tying goal in 3rd, adds lone shootout goal in Bruins’ 4-3 win over Islanders
articles.description:
Marat Khusnutdinov tied it late in the third period and had the lone shootout goal, helping the Boston Bruins beat the New York Islanders 4-3 on Tuesday night for their fourth straight victory

The post Marat Khusnutdinov scores tying goal in 3rd, adds lone shootout goal in Bruins’ 4-3 win over Islanders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marat Khusnutdinov scored the tying goal in the third period for the Bruins.
Khusnutdinov also netted the only shootout goal in the 4-3 victory.
This win marks the Bruins' fourth consecutive victory, boosting local team morale.
